CLUE: Texans sometimes wear hats to hold ten of them
FOUND IN: Big-brimmed cap: A general term for a hat with a wide brim, similar to a ten-gallon hat.
Cuirass (a rigid full-body armor for the torso)
Allow dish to rest before serving (for certain recipes)
Titular (referring to something that is of great significance or size, similar to being "titling")
Nylon (a type of artificial fibre made from petrochemicals)
